DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , inpatient/outpatient , sequential-group study ascend single IV dose ILV-094 administer healthy Japanese male subject .
DOC.criteria: Men age 20 45 year inclusive screening . Body mass index range 17.6 26.4 kg/m2 body weight > 45 . Nonsmoker smoker few 10 cigarette per day . Must abstain smoke inpatient stay . Healthy determine investigator basis screen evaluation .
